text: هذا ذكر وان للمتقين لحسن مـاب

translations.translation: This is a Reminder. Those who have taqwa will have a good Homecoming:
This is a commemoration. Surely for those who take heed for themselves is an excellent place of return --
This was a remembrance. An excellent retreat awaits the God-fearing
Such is their noble story. The pious ones will certainly have the best place to return.
This is an advice; and indeed for the pious is an excellent abode.
This is a Reminder. And verily, for those who have Taqwa is a good final return.
This is a reminder; and most surely there is an excellent resort for those who guard (against evil),
This is a Remembrance; and for the godfearing is a fair resort,
This is a reminder. And lo! for those who ward off (evil) is a happy journey's end,
This is a Reminder. The righteous shall have a good place to return to:
This is an admonition, and verily for the God-feoring is a happy retreat:
This is a Reminder, and indeed the Godwary have a good destination:
This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-
This is a Reminder, and verily, for the Muttaqun (pious and righteous persons - see V. 2:2) is a good final return (Paradise),
This is a Reminder, and indeed for the cautious is a fine return,
This is a reminder. The devout will have a good place of return.
This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return
[38:49] This is a remembrance, of them, [made] by [the mention of] fair praise [of them] here; and indeed for the God-fearing, who comprise them, there will truly be a fair return, in the Hereafter —

(This is a reminder) this is a remembrance of the righteous; it is also said that this means: this Qur'an contains the events of the people of old as well as of future generations. (And lo! for those who ward off (evil)) disbelief, idolatry and indecent acts (is a happy journey's end) a happy return in the Hereafter,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { هَـٰذَا } الذي يتلى عليكم من الأمر بتذكير أولئك الثقات الكرام { ذِكْرٌ } جميل وإثبات شريف وكمال لهم، إنما ذكرناهم وأمرناك بذكرهم تنبيهاً على جلال قدرهم وعظم شأنهم { وَ } بالجملة: { إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ } المجتنبين عن محظوراتنا، المتصفين بمأموراتنا، الطالبين لمرضاتنا، الهاربين من سخطنا وانتقاماتنا { لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ } [ص: 49] عندنا، وخير منقلب ومتاب في كنف جوارنا وساحة عز قبولنا
